source.00828aa1:
import rx 
from rx import Observable,of,operators as op
source.6712624d:
DATA.pipe(
    op.group_by(lambda i: i % 3),
    op.flat_map_latest(lambda group: group.pipe(op.to_list()))  
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result= {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda : print("completed")
)
source.b7f6ffb2:
# flat_map_latest 

transforms an observable sequence of observable sequences 

into an observable sequence producing values 

only from the most recent observable sequence.
source.a97a8078:
# group_by 

This operator will group the values

coming from the source observable

based on the key_mapper function given.
